channel.title: [Pi] slayer shop + slayer point system
channel.description:
hey guys,
i need help on adding a slayer shop and slayer point system to my server i've done many tutorials on how to do that , but none worked all give me tons of errors ...
so if any of u could tell me how to add it , id be thankful
i got pi server 317
thanks :)
